snippet.description:
Thanks to Blizzard for sponsoring this video!
Check out Kobolds & Catacombs ► https://PlayHearthstone.com
The Official HELLO NEIGHBOR! ► https://goo.gl/cKNPXE
FNAF 6’s SECRET GRAVE! ►► https://goo.gl/fqme77
SUBSCRIBE for More GTLive Action! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9

Blizzard just launched their newest Hearthstone expansion, Kobolds & Catacombs. In honor of this expansion's newest feature, the dungeon crawl, Blizzard built an Escape Room and... eh-hem, "invited" us to unlock the secrets within! Steph loves Hearthstone and I love escape rooms, so we were all on board to check out these Real-Life Hearthstone puzzles! Join us for this special GT-Not-Live where Blizzard traps us inside a series puzzles that we must complete in order to be set free!

Subscribe & hang out with us every day! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9
Follow us on Twitter at @MatPatGT and #GTLive

More GTLive Videos:
The FNAF 6 SLACKER ENDING! ►► https://goo.gl/Mr9ahE
The Next Undertale? | HeartBound ►► http://bit.ly/2zMKjTE
MARIO'S RUINED VACATION! ►► https://goo.gl/wmPFXw
Pokemon Pancake Art! ►► https://goo.gl/1ePYG1
Duck Season's Final Ending ►► http://bit.ly/2A1m6wl
HOT WINGS CHALLENGE! ►► https://goo.gl/TvPqkJ
Try Not To Scream in VR! ►► https://goo.gl/324Lqg
MatPat REACTS to YouTubers React! ►► https://goo.gl/3CPnso

Don't have much time but need a quick fix? Check out some of our Must See Moments! Here Are a few to get You Started:

Why FNAF is Over! | TJoC: Story Mode (Pt.1) ► https://goo.gl/Bawy39
Who's Your DADDY! | Dream Daddy ►► https://goo.gl/eJu12i
NO RAGE HERE! | World's Easyest Game ►► https://goo.gl/Rc6UN3
snippet.title: KIDNAPPED by Blizzard! | The Hearthstone Escape Room (Kobolds & Catacombs)
